mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.customer_month_account_bill_sid, t.customer_month_account_bill_code, t.customer_sid, t.company_sid, t.year_months, t.yue_qichu, t.daopiao_benqi, t.fukuan_benqi, t.shoukuan_benqi, t.caigoudikou_benqi, t.koukuan_benqi, t.tiaozhang_benqi, t.yue_qimo, t.yajin, t.zanyakuan, t.yue_shijijieqian, t.yingfuzangu, t.yingshouzangu, t.currency, t.currency_unit, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t4.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name, t5.company_name, t5.short_name as company_short_name, t6.customer_name, t6.short_name as customer_short_name from s_fin_customer_month_account_bill t left join sys_user t2 on t.creator_account = t2.user_name left join sys_user t3 on t.updater_account = t3.user_name left join sys_user t4 on t.confirmer_account = t4.user_name left join s_bas_company t5 on t.company_sid = t5.company_sid left join s_bas_customer t6 on t.customer_sid = t6.customer_sid
mapper.insert:
insert into s_fin_customer_month_account_bill
client_id, customer_month_account_bill_sid, customer_month_account_bill_code, customer_sid, company_sid, year_month, yue_qichu, daopiao_benqi, fukuan_benqi, shoukuan_benqi, caigoudikou_benqi, koukuan_benqi, tiaozhang_benqi, yue_qimo, yajin, zanyakuan, yue_shijijieqian, yingfuzangu, yingshouzangu, currency, currency_unit, remark, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.customerMonthAccountBillSid}, #{item.customerMonthAccountBillCode}, #{item.customerSid}, #{item.companySid}, #{item.yearMonths}, #{item.yueQichu}, #{item.daopiaoBenqi}, #{item.fukuanBenqi}, #{item.shoukuanBenqi}, #{item.caigoudikouBenqi}, #{item.koukuanBenqi}, #{item.tiaozhangBenqi}, #{item.yueQimo}, #{item.yajin}, #{item.zanyakuan}, #{item.yueShijijieqian}, #{item.yingfuzangu}, #{item.yingshouzangu}, #{item.currency}, #{item.currencyUnit}, #{item.remark}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
